sendStatistics.name: Send Statistics
sendStatistics.description: Send statistics such as your UUID, your username, the current addon version and the currently used Minecraft version to TerraMC.net

nameTagConfiguration.name: Show NameTags
nameTagConfiguration.description: Displays the Rank of Staff members and other addon users.

showTag.name: Show Text-Tag
showTag.description: Displays the Rank of a staff member above their name.

showIconTag.name: Show Icon-Tag
showIconTag.description: Displays the TerraMC Logo next to a staff member name or other addon users.

showIconInTab.name: Show Icon in Tablist
showIconInTab.description: Displays the TerraMC logo in front of a staff member or other addon users name in the tablist.

nameTagColor.name: Color of the Text-Tag
nameTagColor.description: Change the color of the 'TERRAMC' text in the Text-Tag

textDecoration.name: Text decoration
textDecoration.description: Change the text decoration of the 'TERRAMC' text in the Text-Tag

updateStatsOnJoin.name: Update stats on join
updateStatsOnJoin.description: When enabled, your stats will get updated if you join on TerraMC.net.

enableAutoGG.name: AutoGG
enableAutoGG.description: Sends automatically a 'GG' on the end of the round in the chat.

error.title: §7§l§o▎§8§l§o▏ §4TerraMC - Error
error.stats-coolDown: You can only update your stats every 5 minutes.

api.stats: An error occurred while loading your stats.
api.data: An error occurred while loading the data.
api.general: The data could not be loaded due to an API error.

success.title: §7§l§o▎§8§l§o▏ §2TerraMC
success.stats-updated: Your stats has been successfully updated.

general.noAccess: You have no access to this site.

apiResponse.406: Unable to fetch Stats! Make sure that you are using the latest version of the addon
